title: EMERGE Tech Conference Wraps Up its First Edition in Dubai Raising Over $1M in Investments for its Startup Winners
description:
The two-day tech conference highlighted some of the most promising fintech, healthtech and B2B start-ups stemming globally and from the MENA region. International Top Tech Conference EMERGE with focus on emerging markets was a two-day event that brought together some of the most innovative minds in technology. The conference was held on May 28th and […]

The post EMERGE Tech Conference Wraps Up its First Edition in Dubai Raising Over $1M in Investments for its Startup Winners appeared first on Coin Edition.
